pages.title: Bonus
pages.text: Thank you for playing Beyond Earth! $(br) This mod is currently a work in progress and has a lot of new and exiting features Planned!$(br)Feel free to check the CurseForge page to see what new updates are coing out.

Many people have collaborated together to build this mod:$(br)$(li)Main Dev: MrScautHD$()$(li)Dev: ExistingEevee$()$(li)Sound Artist:Mvbz$()$(li)Texturer:FritzHackenstien,Fizz,SeagullBoi,Jopken,Lego245$()$(li)Modeler:Scarecrow,ShreksRightT***e1$()$(li)Builder: Barracuda,Solar,Spacestar,Cheche√±o,Rer0$()$(li)Book Writer: Kraaven$()
